Go to the documentation of this file.
1 // sends commands to the HRP in terms of speed, angular and linear
2 
3 #include <unicorn/am_unicorn_interface.h>
4 
5 int main(int argc, char** argv){
6  ros::init(argc, argv, "am_unicorn_interface");
7  ROS_INFO("Started automower to unicorn interface");
8  AmUnicornInterface am_unicorn_interface;
9  ros::Rate r(30.0);
10  while(ros::ok())
11  {
12  am_unicorn_interface.publishCmd();
13  ros::spinOnce();
14  r.sleep();
15  }
16 }
17 
18 AmUnicornInterface::AmUnicornInterface()
19 {
20  cmd_vel_sub_ = n_.subscribe("/unicorn/cmd_vel", 0, &AmUnicornInterface::cmdVelCallback, this);
21  unicorn_cmd_vel_pub_ = n_.advertise<geometry_msgs::Twist>("cmd_vel", 0);
22 }
23 
24 void AmUnicornInterface::cmdVelCallback(const geometry_msgs::Twist& cmd_vel)
25 {
26  unicorn_cmd_vel_ = cmd_vel;
27  unicorn_cmd_vel_.linear.x = -unicorn_cmd_vel_.linear.x;
28  unicorn_cmd_vel_.linear.z = -unicorn_cmd_vel_.linear.z;
29 }
30 
31 void AmUnicornInterface::publishCmd()
32 {
33  unicorn_cmd_vel_pub_.publish(unicorn_cmd_vel_);
34 }
